gaps.description: Building values for Location 1 appear to be underinsured by approximately 20% based on current construction costs.
gaps.impact: In the event of a total loss, client may face a $700,000 coverage shortfall.
gaps.recommendation: Increase building limit to $4,200,000 to align with current replacement cost estimates.

gaps.description: Business Income limit is insufficient based on financial records showing 18-month recovery period.
gaps.impact: Extended business interruption would exceed current limits by approximately $500,000.
gaps.recommendation: Increase BI limit to $1,500,000 with extended period of indemnity endorsement.

gaps.description: Products-completed operations coverage is inadequate for manufacturing risk exposure.
gaps.impact: Product liability claim could exceed policy limits, especially with multiple occurrences.
gaps.recommendation: Increase products-completed operations aggregate limit to $5,000,000.

gaps.description: Property policy deductible is higher than industry standard for similar risks.
gaps.impact: Higher out-of-pocket expenses for frequent small claims.
gaps.recommendation: Consider reducing property deductible to $10,000 with slight premium adjustment.

gaps.description: No cyber liability coverage despite significant digital asset exposure.
gaps.impact: Complete lack of coverage for data breaches, ransomware, business interruption from cyber events.
gaps.recommendation: Add cyber liability policy with minimum $1M limit including coverage for business interruption.

crossSellOpportunities.description: Client has significant data exposure with no cyber coverage in place. Manufacturing operations with connected equipment present additional risk vectors.
Client's manufacturing equipment represents significant value without specialized breakdown coverage beyond standard property policy.
Given high product liability exposure, recommend $5M umbrella coverage to provide adequate protection above primary policy limits.
Manufacturing operations have potential pollution exposures not covered under standard property or liability policies.
